title: Brownie Sundaes
content: Brownie Sundaes are here! Come get one today!  Rita’s didn’t invent Italian Ice, but we certainly made it cool. That’s what happens when you combine Italian Ice and happiness. And yes, in case you were wondering, there really was a Rita. Ice. Custard. Happiness. It’s a simple, straight forward Promise. And one we work hard to make good on. Every day. In every location.
